>>38905405

> [[ 76 ]]

A low swing to the leg chips a stone chunk free, and the heat rising off your blade as you swing sends bits of molten crystal flying to solidify in the water below. You duck under another punch, moving back to ready yourself for another slash—nearby, you see Tatsumaki and Nel, ever eager, looking for a way inside. You can see Vyx, shooting on the run and quite literally bouncing off the walls, leaving afterimages in her wake.

Andor and Donnel move past you, making their way into melee range. The former's rapier is wrapped in golden light as he thrusts, and you see him enter a strange, almost transcendent state as the construct strikes back, as if an invisible hand is pulling him away from danger; the latter is rousing you to action, knocking out chunks from the legs with each heavy-handed swing.

But you've already got your sights on your target—and as you make your next swing, red rings of light fan out from your core. Haste.

> Cripple the legs.
> Go for the wounded arm again.
> Go for the eye.
> Other.
